test.instr: (:ins (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue) (sort Y table)))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator))) (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X black) (sort Y closet))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X yellow) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X black) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X black) (sort Y microwave))) )
test.nl: The book which is blue must be on the table. The door of the refrigerator is opened. There is a can which is black on the closet. Put a book in the microwave. Put the yellow bottle in the refrigerator. Close the door of the microwave. Put a black can on the refrigerator. Put a remotecontrol which is black on the microwave.
